increase 12 3r 1sc increase repeat 6 times 18 4r 2sc increase repeat 6 times 24 crochet 4 more single_crochet sl chain turn and crochet 4sc sl cut the yarn leave a long end for sewing image 20 make 2 details visor with green yarn chain 15 1r in second stitch single_crochet 12sc 3sc in next stitch crochet round 12sc 2sc in next stitch that already has the very first single crochet 30 crochet in spiral 2r 14sc chain single_crochet chain 14sc chain single_crochet chain sl image 21 cut the yarn leave a long end for sewing all details are ready and we are ready to assemble 9 assembly take the visor and the main part of the hat sew the visor with the end of green yarn that we left before the bottom part of the visor must be a little lower than the main part of the hat fasten and cut the yarn hiding the end image 22 on the back side of the visor sew an ear cap on the side of the main part of the hat with the end of light green yarn that we left before fasten and cut the yarn hiding the end on the back side of the ear cap the second ear cap must be sewn symmetrically image 23 the hat is ready image 24 image 26 image 25 10 assembly when the hat is ready start sewing the arms put one arm to the side of the body making sure that the thumb is facing forward image 27 sew this arm using the end of light green yarn that we left before fasten and cut the yarn hiding the end inside the body image 28 the second arm must be sewn symmetrically image 29 embroider the pockets with black yarn image 30 11 assembly take a piece of white felt and cut out two identical eyes image 31 place the eyes symmetrically a bit lower than the center of the head sew them with black yarn making a few stitches to embroider the pupils image 32 embroider the mouth with black yarn try the hat on image
